UMLOCKEO
CLOSt DOON
LIFE PRESERVER
Life preservers, if needed, are located under each seat or in
seat back pouch.
TO PREPARE FOR A LANDING ON WATER
1. Follow instructions of crew
2. Pull on Life Preserver (see instructions with Life Preserver).
3. Assume bracing position (see diagram)
4. After plane stops completely, unfasten seat belt.
Follow instructions of crew.
5. After leaving plane, inflate Life Preserver
EMERGENCY EXIT OPERATION
PASSENGER DOOR OPERATION
1. Rotate handle in direction of arrow.
2. Push door OUT.
FIRE
EXTINGUISHER
NORMAL
EXIT
CLOSED
WINDOW EMERGENCY EXIT
1. Grab HATCH HANDLE.
Pull handle and entire
hatch INWARD AND UP, clear of opening.
EMERGENCY
EXIT
EMERGENCY
FORM WP M57
1/91
EXIT
2.
Rotate hatch 90° and extend bottom through opening.
Throw hatch outside aircraft.
FIRE
EXTINGUISHER
CAUTION
DO NOT HANDLE OR ATTEMPT TO OPEN THE PASSENGER
DOOR OR WINDOW EMERGENCY EXITS UNLESS THEY ARE TO
BE USED IN AN EMERGENCY.
PLEASE DO NOT REMOVE THIS CARD FROM AIRCRAFT
2005. 133.281

^ DELTA
CONNECTION°
Operated by Sky West
SSENGER SAFETY INFORMATION
"NO SMOKING" AND "FASTEN SEAT BELT" SIGNS
For your safety and comfort, please comply with the "NO SMOKING" and
"FASTEN SEAT BELT" signs when they are illuminated. Seat belts should be
fastened securely.
As a precaution against unexpected turbulence, you
should keep your seat fastened at all times while seated.
TO FASTEN
Insert metal tab into
metal
buckle until it
snaps.
METRO
Il or IlI
NO SMOKING ALLOWED WHEN OXYGEN IN USE
TO ADJUST
Pull end of belt until desired
secureness is obtained.
TO REMOVE
Insert fingers under buckle
flange and lift upward.
The altitudes at which the aircraft operates may
require the use of OXYGEN in the event there is a
loss of cabin pressure. Should this occur, a crow
member will notify you.
1. Take the mask which is stowed in the seat back
or under your seat and promptly insert the hose
plug into OXYGEN outlet receptacle located
either (A) overhead or (B) next to seat.
2. Place mask over your nose and mouth.
Breathe normally.
3. Adjust headband to hold mask snugly.
4. Wear mask until advised by crew to remove it.
PLEASE DO NOT REMOVE THIS CARD FROM AIRCRAFT
properties.sfomuseum:creditline: Gift of the William Hough Collection
properties.sfomuseum:description: Safety information card issued by Delta Connection by SkyWest for the Fairchild Metro II or III fleet; white double-sided card with illustrations and text demonstrating safety instructions and emergency procedures; information code WP M57, revised 1/91.
properties.wof:name: safety information card: Delta Connection by SkyWest, Fairchild (Swearingen) Metro II or III
